stories.text: Do I need to get insurance for my small business? Or is it only necessary for large enterprises? I would like to get insurance, but I do not know where it is better to do it. Share your experience, please!
stories.title: Do I need to get insurance for my small business?

stories.text:
Long term programmer/architect in business IT. Work is quiet so I was thinking of starting a new technical book. I think the only one I managed to read fully this year was Designing Data Intensive Systems, which seemed to fit exactly with my needs at the time.

I've also spent a little bit of time filling gaps in knowledge around Security, Networking, Cloud and Devops.

Any suggestions from the crowd?
stories.title: Ask HN: What books to read before next year
Boeing and Airbus warn US over 5G safety concerns
Lawmakers Urge Tech Companies to ‘Mitigate Harm’ of Suicide Website
